gawking at
> the
> > > two bots hooked together and get them to a chamber, I only have 
two
> > > characters in this game and don't want to lose one while 
everyone stands
> > > around watching. this is a RPG so play don't watch. (I know I'm 
modeing
> by
> > > making suggestions ooc and I'm sorry but I'm in no hurry to see 
those
> two
> > > die just yet.)
> > >
> > > Now back to the action
> > >
> > > Lunarpine's next view is a light flashing before him, he could 
feel a
> > > comfortable warmth there. All around him he could see visions of
> warriors,
> > > Maximals Predacons, And a few symbols he didn't recognize. He'd 
heard
> bots
> > > speak of this place before when they were brought back from 
beyond, he
> > > somehow knew where he was he just didn't know how he got there 
or why he
> > was
> > > here.
> > >
> > > Lunarpine thought his punishment for his failures would surely 
be the
> pit,
> > > and the clincher would be his failure to save Shadow Wing. Now 
he knew
> he
> > > was to late. Now he knew that he'd cost himself his own life 
for a
> > worthless
> > > gesture.
> > >
> > > He sensed somehow that every bot around him knew his thoughts, 
his
> fears,
> > > his emotions. Somehow he could sense thiers too. warriors of 
the highest
> > > quality, sciencebots destroyed before thier greatest 
achievements could
> be
> > > created, Predacons who fought valiantly to save lives instead of
> > extinguish
> > > them.
> > >
> > > A ball of light approached him and took shape a youthfull bot, 
an image
> > that
> > > didn't seem to belong here was now before him. Lunarpine opened 
his
> mouth
> > to
> > > speak but quickly learned it wasn't necessary.
> > >
> > > The new bots voice consumed him "I was Piston of a group from 
the last
> > great
> > > war, I was a new recruit for a unit called the Misfits of 
Cyberton I
> have
> > > been selected for your adjustment."
> > >
> > > Lunarpine,s confusion was the normal response for a bot struck 
down
> > > unexpectadely. The voices seemed to laugh. again he attempted to
> > communicate
> > > this time with his thoughts. "How'd I get here? and why are you
> adjusting
> > > me?(Please this is a spiritual moment avoid any lewd comments.)
> > >
> > > Piston glanced back "I'm the rogue of the group, the young 
stubborn one.
> I
> > > died in a battle with a technowizzard in the swamps of 
paradrose. My
> > > adjustor was a rogue too, are you sensing a pattern?"
> > >
> > > (I'll continue in another post shortly so you people don't get 
eye
> strain
> > > reading this.)
